allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix critical issues and add new features

Critical Bug Fixes:
- Fixed report template fetching (changed to POST method with proper data structure)
- Fixed buttons hanging off screen (reduced padding from 12,6 to 8,4 and font to 8pt)
- Fixed cloud agents 404 error (changed endpoint to /api/2.0/fo/asset/host/)
- Reduced spacing between button groups (15px to 8px) for better screen fit

New Features:
- Added List Activation Keys operation for cloud agent management
- Added real-time filtering/searching to formatted output
- Filter bar above formatted output table
- Clear Filter button for quick reset
- Filter searches across all columns in real-time

Improvements:
- Better error messages with alternative endpoint suggestions
- More compact button layout for smaller screens
- Improved API endpoint handling with fallback suggestions
- Enhanced user feedback for failed operations
- Store tree data for efficient filtering

All major functionality now operational with improved UX.
EOF
)")
